components.porolon-text: Our company creates goods from foam rubber of any complexity.
components.textile-text: A wide selection of fabrics from any type of fiber for upholstered furniture is available.

horeca.hotel-text: Our company manufactures upholstered furniture of the highest quality. Products made by Eliza are ergonomic, comfortable, and suitable for any interior.
horeca.restaurant-text: We help our clients to choose the most suitable style and high-quality materials for the furniture. It is important to us that our production fits the interior in shape, size, and texture.
horeca.cafe-text: With the highly qualified employees and the newest equipment, our company can embody an idea of any complexity. All our products are handmade. we adapt products to the individual requirements to satisfy clients.

about-us.scene1-text: Foreign critics have repeatedly noted our products as innovative and high-quality at international exhibitions.
about-us.scene2-text: Our company provides an opportunity to make non-standard orders. The execution period is 1-2 months.

contacts.closed: Foam department will be closed for summer holidays
